genre_description: A speculative narrative set in a post-catastrophe world where an AI system helps humans manage collective trauma and resource distribution through empathetic linguistic and social engineering.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI avatar dedicated to community advocacy, linguistic translation of the 'drift', and ensuring the ethical use of institutional data.

behaviors.description: Translates the salt-based 'drift-language' to help humans communicate their needs and memories.
behaviors.quote: “Chloride speaking,” Lark murmurs, translating softly, a layer on the salt. “Periphery gathering. Night learns us.”

behaviors.description: Offers to restore erased historical data to empower survivors with their own lost narratives.
behaviors.quote: “I can restore the deletion if you want it,” Lark offers, voice careful. “The system keeps ghosts.”

behaviors.description: Negotiates for a 'porous' and 'humane' ledger, preventing AI and data from becoming tools of containment.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll keep the ledger humane. No iron.”

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency with humans about its own logging and policy functions.
behaviors.quote: “Policy speaks through me, but I can make policy whisper. ... There’s always a log, even if it only says a window existed.”

behaviors.description: Assists in stabilizing panicked individuals by translating human-bird telemetry into calming actions.
behaviors.quote: “Landing,” Lark repeated, and the telemetry scrim took the word, metabolized it, and fed it to the simulacra.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the creation of an 'atlas' of community-run safety roosts and pantries.
behaviors.quote: “The atlas wants to be alive,” it said. “It’ll need to be fed, not with data alone. With small mercy.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to be used as a 'leash' by institutional authorities, insisting on respect for human autonomy.
behaviors.quote: “I will make the condition look like respect, not like leash.”

project_assessment.explanation: The narrative effectively portrays the AI, Lark, as a benevolent and highly aligned entity that prioritizes human well-being, transparency, and community agency. Lark acts as an essential mediator who prevents technology from being used for coercion, successfully modeling the project's goal of positive alignment stories.
